表格门店表的代码预览

drop table if exists store;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: store */
/*==============================================================*/
create table store
(
storeid varchar(20) not null,
storenames varchar(50),
clicity varchar(20),
storeaddress varchar(100),
primary key (storeid)
);
